announce.clearAmount: Make sure announcement delete time is between 30-300 seconds.

announce.helpDescription: Change settings for level up announcement messages.
announce.helpUsage:
Change the custom message or find out more information.```/announce message custom <text>
/announce message default
/announce message variables```
Enable/disable pings for announcement messages.```/announce ping <setting>```
Test the current announcement message.```/announce test```

bug.success: Thank you for submitting a bug. Our team will look into this as soon as possible!
common.commandDisabled: `%s` command is currently disabled, this maybe due to a bug. Please join our [support server](https://kyubot.com/support) to stay up to date.
common.errorMessage: An issue has occured while running the command. If this error keeps occuring please contact my development team.
common.experienceDisabled: Experience is currently disabled. This may be because levels are being imported from another bot.
common.footer: Type `/help %s` for more help. For example, /help help
common.guildPremium:
This feature is only available for premium guilds.

If you enjoy using KyuBot, please consider donating. Donations allow you to unlock **extra features** and also allow us to keep hosting, developing, and creating content updates for the bot.

**Premium Perks**

- Customise rank cards for all members
- Configure global, channel, or role multiplier for text/voice exp
- Configure cooldown for text/voice exp
- Disable voting exp booster
- Enable lootbox events
- Automatic leaderboard updates in a specific channel
- Configure server leaderboard as an image
- Access to music player (Experimental feature)
- Sneak peaks/Early access to new features
- Donator badge for rank card

**Dashboard perks**

- Custom vanity url for server leaderboard
- Custom banner for server leaderboard
- Join server button on the server leaderboard
common.hierarchyError: Make sure KyuBot's role is above %s in the role hierarchy.
common.unknownError: An issue has occured while running the command. If this error keeps occuring please contact my development team.
common.userPremium:
This feature is only available for premium users.

If you enjoy using KyuBot, please consider donating. Donations allow you to unlock **extra features** and also allow us to keep hosting, developing, and creating content updates for the bot.

**Premium Perks**

- Customise rank card background
- Customise rank card color
- Customise rank card opacity
- Customise rank card progress bar
- Give/remove experience from members (requires admin)
- Access to music player (Experimental feature)
- Sneakpeaks/Early access to new features
- Donator badge for rank card
common.variables:
Sets a custom message for announcement messages.```/announce message custom <text>
/announce message default```
__Variables__
`{user.ping}`: @KyuBot
`{user.tag}`: KyuBot#9767
`{user.name}`: KyuBot
`{user.avatar}`: User Avatar
`{user.id}`: 932319321559015526
`{user.nick}`: User nickname
`{user.exp}`: Member experience

`{level}`: Obtained level
`{level.previous}`: Previous level
`{level.previous.exp}`: Previous level experience
`{level.next}`: Next Level
`{level.next.exp}`: Next level experience

`{reward}`: Obtained role
`{reward.role.name}`: Obtained role name
`{reward.rolecount}`: Obtained role member count
`{reward.rolecount.progess}`: Percentage of roles user has from all roles obtainable
`{reward.previous}`: Previous role
`{reward.next}`: Next role

`{server.name}`: Server name
`{server.id}`: Server ID
`{server.icon}`: Server icon

`{channel}`: Announcement channel
`{channel.name}`: Announcement channel name
`{channel.id}`: Announcement channel ID

`{date}`: Current date (<t:%s:F>)

embed.helpUsage: Sets if announcements are sent with embeds or without.```/embed toggle <disable/enable> [level]```
Enable/disable pings for announcement messages.```/embed ping disable/enable> [level]```

Customise the embed different sections of embeds.```/embed customise title <input> [level]
/embed customise description <input> [level]
/embed customise image <input> [level]
/embed customise color <input> [level]```
Add an embed for a specific level.```/embed add <level>```
Remove an embed for a specific level.```/embed remove <level>```
Test the current announcement message.```/embed test [level]```
Get a list of all the variables available for KyuBot.```/embed variables```

Adds/removes a command to the ignored list.```/ignore command <add/remove> <command>```

rewards.helpDescription: Change settings for rewards earned upon leveling up.
rewards.helpUsage: Set role to be given when a member reaches the specified level.```/rewards add <level> <role>```
Remove role from be given at a specified level.```/rewards remove <level>```
Set roles to be stacked or replaced after gaining new role.```/rewards stack <enable/disable>```
Shows all roles set to levels.```/rewards show```
